name: Why this game is so hard?
name_original: Why this game is so hard?
description:
This game does not have a specific name.
I call it "Where is the colors?" or "Why is this game so hard?"
But I hope you like it :D
[UPDATE NOTES]
Death count fixed
Controller can now be used in the Game Menu
An easter egg in the menu :D
Change in jump speed an strength of the color Black
-----------------------------------------------------
[UPDATE NOTE2.0]
On the last level the final door is gone, but i already fixed it
